to make your perfect sense wrap 9 let s get making tool kit gauge 5 5 5 6 balls of watg s alpachino merino to ensure your knitting has the same 1 perfect sense wrap pattern measurements as the pattern it is a good 1 set of 5mm us8 100cm/40 idea to make a gauge swatch before you circular knitting needles start knitting your project a gauge swatch 1 set of 6 5mm us10 5 100cm/40 is a small sample of your knitting where you circular knitting needles count the stitches and row and check them 1 sewing needle against the measurements cm/in given in the pattern if you get more stitches/ row than the pattern s gauge it means your knitting is tighter if you get fewer stitches/row than the pattern your knitting is looser sometimes it works to knit tighter or looser to compensate 5mm us8 1x1 rib stitch 10 cm/4 = 22 stitches 10 cm/4 = 22 row 6 5mm us10 5 stocking stitch 10 cm/4 = 13 5 stitches 10 cm/4 = 18 row you can find all techniques on page 17 pssst remember that you must not copy our patterns and sell or even give them away for free in accordance with copyright law 10 #woolandthegang eng how to make your perfect sense wrap your wrap is made by working in the round 5 knit 1 round
